CustomField.description: CLAIMSV2-77. When the Total Labor Override Amount is not populated, Actual Labor Total will be equal to Suggested Labour Settlement, otherwise, it will be equal to Labor Override Amount
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Total Labor Override Amount is not populated, Actual Labor Total will be equal to Suggested Labour Settlement, otherwise, it will be equal to Labor Override Amount
CustomField.label: Actual Labor Total
